alert.note: Alert for Badlands Area; Custer County Plains; Fall River County Area; Pine Ridge Area (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued July 17 at 6:46PM MDT until July 18 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT ON MONDAY FROM NOON UNTIL 8 PM MDT FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 321, 322, 325, 326, AND 332 IN SOUTHWESTERN SOUTH DAKOTA AND ZONES 314, 315, AND 317 IN NORTHEASTERN WYOMING... .Hot and dry weather will continue Monday as winds increase out of the southwest and west. Temperatures in the 90s to lower 100s, relative humidity values in the 10 to 15 percent range, and sustained winds of 15 to 25 mph with gusts to 40 mph may combine to produce conditions favorable for large fire growth. Local fuel conditions may preclude fire growth in some areas. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH MONDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 322, 325, 326, AND 332... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 322 Fall River County Area, 325 Custer County Plains, 326 Pine Ridge Area and 332 Badlands Area. * WINDS...Southwest 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 12 percent. * IMPACTS...The combination of gusty winds, low relative humidity and dry fuels would produce critical fire weather conditions.
info.instruction: A fire weather watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible red flag warnings.

area.areaDesc: Badlands Area; Custer County Plains; Fall River County Area; Pine Ridge Area
